about.title: About me
about.me: Full Stack developer with over four years of experience, specializing in creating web and mobile solutions using a broad spectrum of cutting-edge technologies. My main focus encompasses languages and frameworks such as ReactJS, React Native, NextJs, VueJS, NuxtJs, NodeJS, and TypeScript. I have worked on the development of diverse projects, including e-commerce platforms, personal portfolios, and corporate websites. My experience extends to the mobile realm, having developed an application using React Native. In addition, I possess in-depth knowledge in the use of essential tools such as AWS, Shopify, WordPress, Bootstrap, MongoDB, Github, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, NestJs, Bitbucket, Remix, Prisma, Chakra UI, VS Code, Expo, and Docker, demonstrating my versatility and adaptability to diverse technological environments. I am known for keeping up to date with the latest trends in programming, continuously expanding my skills through educational platforms such as Udemy. My strong commitment to continuous learning and professional growth positions me as a highly motivated developer ready to face complex challenges in software development.

projects.title: Projects
projects.raccoon: Responsive website of the RaccoonStudio company, the site allows you to see some of the projects carried out.
projects.oleum: Completely personalized, responsive ecommerce designed from scratch. We worked with a personalized frontstore with reactive technology, using Shopify only as an engine to check out and manage products. Integration of SEO, Analytics, Subscription with connection to mailchimp.
projects.playeat: Mobile application for Android and iOS, developed with React Native, Expo. The app allows users to make reservations, view the menu, and pay with a credit or debit card using stripe.
projects.fahcal: Responsive website for the company Fahcal, informative and contact, the site allows you to see the services offered by the company and contact them.
projects.2rivers: Responsive extreme sports website, the site allows you to see the services it offers as well as make reservations, display information about users and guides.

resume.title: Resume
resume.red: Red ribbon in architecture design to create Web applications
resume.black: Black ribbon in architecture design to create Web applications
resume.directoDescription: Managed local deployments with Docker Swarm on multiple clusters. Creating RESTful microservices with Rabbitmq and redis. Platform maintenance with Nestjs to manage millions of calls every day.
resume.seoDescription: WEB positioning, Web Development, Review and correction of metadata.
resume.raccoon: Development and support of multiple websites and e-commerce platforms. Successfully integrated AWS cloud services to fulfill application needs like: Sending notifications and emails with SNS, SES. Management and administration of EC2 servers. Use of S3 for resources administration. Route 53, Domain Name System (DNS). A CI/CD pipeline was implemented using Bitbucket Pipelines to automate the build and deployment of applications. Built-in Slack notifications to receive alerts on the status of the implementation and any issues that may arise.
resume.freelanceDescription: I collaborated in the development of a site for extreme sports using: NestJS, ReactJS, NextJS, multilingual support using i18n, use of multiple currencies to display depending on the country. Personal site development using: ReactJS, NextJS, Tailwind CSS, multilingual support with i18n.
